articles.author: Katie Campione
articles.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Officially Becomes Netflix’s Most Popular Film Ever After Another Week Of Near 0% Audience Decline - Deadline
articles.description: Kpop Demon Hunters tallied another 25.4M views last week to become Netflix's most popular film of all time
articles.content:
The moment has finally arrived: Kpop Demon Huntershas officially become Netflix’s most popular film of all time.
The animated musical produced by Sony Pictures Animation added another 25.4M views fr… [+2355 chars]
